Class game

java.lang.Object
game
public class game extends Object
class reprisenting an active game

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    (package private) boolean[]
    hit
    array to store which letters have been guessed correctly
    (package private) int
    life
    players remaining life if it drops to zero the game ends in defeat
    (package private) int
    points
    players collected points if they drop below zero the game ends in defeat
    (package private) int[][]
    propabilities
    array of propabilities that a letter (first index) has to appear on a specific spot in the word (second index) doesn't store real probabilities but the total number of times those letters appear in those spots
    (package private) String
    word
    the word the player is trying to find
    (package private) Set<String>
    words
    set of all probable words given what the user has found

    boolean
    make_move​(char guess_char, int guess_spot)
    takes a guess from the player if the guess is correct it increases the players points by 5 points if it had a greater probability to be correct 0.6, 10 if probability greater than 0.4, 15 if probability greater than 0.25 and 30 probability lesser than 0.25 if the guess is wrong it decreases health by one and points by 15 recalculates probabilities given the new information returns true if the player guessed correctly and false otherwise

  • Field Details

    • word

      String word
      the word the player is trying to find

    • words

      Set<String> words
      set of all probable words given what the user has found

    • propabilities

      int[][] propabilities
      array of propabilities that a letter (first index) has to appear on a specific spot in the word (second index) doesn't store real probabilities but the total number of times those letters appear in those spots

    • life

      int life
      players remaining life if it drops to zero the game ends in defeat

    • points

      int points
      players collected points if they drop below zero the game ends in defeat

    • hit

      boolean[] hit
      array to store which letters have been guessed correctly

  • Constructor Details

    • game

      public game​(dictionary dic, Integer point)
      constructs a game from dictionairy dic. A word will be chosen at random, the set words will be filled with all words of equal length and probabilities will be initialized the point arg is meant to carry on points from previous games if it's negative or null points are initialized to 15
      Parameters:
      dic - dictionairy to chose a word from
      point - points earned in previous games

  • Method Details

    • print_found

      public String print_found()
      prints and returns the letters that have been guessed correctly with '_' filling for those that have yet to be guessed
      Returns:
      the target word with '_' replacing letters that have not yet been guessed correctly

    • make_move

      public boolean make_move​(char guess_char, int guess_spot)
      takes a guess from the player if the guess is correct it increases the players points by 5 points if it had a greater probability to be correct 0.6, 10 if probability greater than 0.4, 15 if probability greater than 0.25 and 30 probability lesser than 0.25 if the guess is wrong it decreases health by one and points by 15 recalculates probabilities given the new information returns true if the player guessed correctly and false otherwise
      Parameters:
      guess_char - the character the player guesses
      guess_spot - the spot in the word the player guesses the character is
      Returns:
      true if guess is correct, false if it is incorrect

    • victory

      public boolean victory()
      calculates if the game has been won
      Returns:
      true if the whole word has been guessed correctly, false otherwise

    • defeat

      public boolean defeat()
      calculates if the game has been won
      Returns:
      true if life has reached 0 or points have fallen bellow 0, false otherwise

    • recalculate_probabilities

      private void recalculate_probabilities​(char guess_char, int guess_spot)
      recalculates the probabilities based on the players guess
      Parameters:
      guess_char - the character the player guesses
      guess_spot - the spot in the word the player guesses the character is
